abstract: The arrival of the former Goldman Sachs partner as executive chairman and C.E.O. means there will be three insiders on Evercore’s board.
snippet: The arrival of the former Goldman Sachs partner as executive chairman and C.E.O. means there will be three insiders on Evercore’s board.
lead_paragraph: Evercore’s two chairmen are an enviable problem. Wooing former Goldman Sachs partner John Weinberg is a coup for the $2.9 billion advisory firm. Making him executive chairman, though, muddies governance and creates top-heavy management.

headline.main: Evercore’s ‘Good’ Problem of Adding John Weinberg to the Board
